DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability long-term dose ALN-TTR02 ( patisiran ) patient transthyretin ( TTR ) mediate amyloidosis ( ATTR ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Study Investigational Drug , ALN-TTR02 ( Patisiran ) , Treatment Transthyretin ( TTR ) -Mediated Amyloidosis Patients Who Have Already Been Treated With ALN-TTR02 ( Patisiran )
DOC.criteria: Previously receive tolerate ALNTTR02 ( patisiran ) Study ALNTTR02002 . Adequate Karnofsky performance status , liver function , renal function . Pregnant nursing . Has liver transplant . Has New York Heart Association heart failure classification > 2 . Has unstable angina . Has uncontrolled clinically significant cardiac arrhythmia .
